description.brief: The arm package controls the ARM and creates movement commands.

package.description: arm is a ROS package for controlling a Manus ARM. The package consists of one control node and two teleop nodes. You must have a Manus ARM properly connected and configured in order for this package to be of any use. You must have both a teleop node and the control node running in order to move the ARM. There is a node for keyboard teleop and a node for neuron dish activity teleop.
package.author: Jonathan Hasenzahl
